message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.IR 

The paper discusses the use of crowdsourcing for generating microtasks, which is a common topic in the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of algorithms for efficient crowdsourcing, which falls under the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of cost forecasting to balance resources, which is related to the Cybersecurity (cs.CY) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the potential applications of crowd-generated microtasks, which falls under the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
